page.title: 14WORKING MEN'S CLUBS.
page.content: {East Dene Social Club}is a very large club. It was{built in 1928. } There are{over five thousand members at the club. Before you become a member you have to fill a form in. If you are a member you and your children can go on{day trips}and you will get {Â£5 pocket money.}They go to places like{Bridlington}or{Cleethorpes.}The club opens{every day}at 11.00a.m. to 3.30 p.m. and 6.00 p.m. to 10.30 p.m. The people who run the club are the {secretary, president}and the {committee.}The{amenities}they offer are football, cricket, bowls, snooker, darts, fishing, dominoes, cards, dancing and bandits.The club has been modernised many times over the years, and now has a new lounge. All the rooms are{very large}and well decorated with comfortable furniture.
